mirzydotes: Anxiety is a trained pattern of thought — we learn anxiety. Unlearning it can take a lifetime. You’re such an inspiration for committing to making milestone changes to combat your anxiety while also letting complete strangers in on the hard work you do. Thanks for it. It really helps.
